title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Online Instruction Based on Performing Arts for 21st-Century Skills Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform effective communication strategies through drama-based role-play activities with at least 80% proficiency.
One can design and execute creative problem-solving scenarios using digital collaboration tools at least three times.

Learners maintain reflective journaling with weekly feedback loops over 1–6 months, demonstrating self-directed learning competencies by achieving level 3+ on a 5-level teacher-provided rubric (clarity, depth of reflection, action planning, improvement efforts, creativity)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
